mapper.insert: insert into UnitLog (unitId, unitType, accountId, status, prevLevel, prevSkill0Lv, prevSkill1Lv, prevSkill2Lv, prevSkill3Lv, resultLevel) values (#{unitId}, #{unitType}, #{accountId}, #{status}, #{prevLevel}, #{prevSkill0Lv}, #{prevSkill1Lv}, #{prevSkill2Lv}, #{prevSkill3Lv}, #{resultLevel})
